mutants.code:
def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::+1] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-2] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-0] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

    words = string.split()

    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::--1] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string
